abstract: The market for M.&A. could see some real growth in the coming months after over a year of declining deal volume, according to a new study by Thomson Reuters and JPMorgan Chase.
snippet: The market for M.&A. could see some real growth in the coming months after over a year of declining deal volume, according to a new study by Thomson Reuters and JPMorgan Chase.
lead_paragraph: The market for mergers and acquisitions could see some real growth in the coming months after more than a year of declining deal volume, according to a new joint study published on Tuesday by Thomson Reuters and JPMorgan Chase.

headline.main: Study Projects Upsurge in M.& A. Activity
